com.karuslabs.commons.commands

Interface Criteria

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Criteria
    Represents a criteria for executing a command. Contains implementations of commonly used criteria.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Criteria NO_ARGUMENTS 
      static Criteria NONE 
      static Criteria PERMITTED 
      static Criteria PERMITTED_PLAYER

      Tests if the criteria passes.

    • Method Detail

      • test

        boolean test(Command command,
             org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
             String[] args)
        Tests if the criteria passes.
        Parameters:
        command - The command
        sender - Source object which is executing this command
        args - The command's arguments
        Returns:
        true if the criteria passes and false otherwise

      • within

        static boolean within(String[] args,
                      int min,
                      int max)
        Tests if the number of arguments is within the specified boundaries.
        Parameters:
        args - The command's arguments
        min - The inclusive minimum number of arguments
        max - The inclusive maximum number of arguments
        Returns:
        true if within the boundaries and false otherwise
